text:
💉Vaccinated

🤗Today I received the first of 2 doses of the Pfizer #covid19 #vaccine and I am thankful, grateful, hopeful, and as you can see: happy!

🙏🏽Thank you to the scientific community, the researchers, donators and trial participants! 

#ThisIsOurShot #FauciOuchie https://t.co/n433k0wOD2
